fields.name: Abacus

fields.description: Open for researchers associated with British Columbia universities to deposit data.

fields.name: CIMMYT
fields.description: Free, open access repository of research data and software produced and developed by CIMMYT scientists.

fields.name: IBICT
fields.description: The network Cariniana, cariniana.ibict.br is funded entirely by the Brazilian government and in particular by MCTI (Ministério da Ciência, Tecnologia e Inovação). It is a project for long-term preservation of scientific publications in Brazil. The main focus concerns the open access journals published in Brazil. In a second phase, which is about to begin, it will proceed with the preservation of the doctoral thesis. The third phase will cover the scientific data to be deposited in a research data repository. The experimental phase lasted a year (2013). The network uses the open source LOCKSS and it is made today from 9 nodes: besides IBICT, 8 other institutions. There are 636 eJournals preserved and 84 institutions are served by the network from universities and research centers in Brazil.

fields.name: International Institute of Social History
fields.description: The IISH Dataverse contains micro-, meso-, and macro-level datasets on social and economic history.

fields.name: Libra Data
fields.description: Libra Data is a place for UVA researchers to share data publicly, and is part of the Libra Scholarly Repository suite of services which includes works of UVA scholarship such as articles, books, theses, and data.

fields.name: Odum Institute
fields.description: Open for all researchers worldwide from all disciplines to deposit data. The Odum Institute also offers multiple data curation service levels, for more information, go to: http://www.irss.unc.edu/odum/contentSubpage.jsp?nodeid=661

fields.name: UiT (The Arctic University of Norway)

fields.description: Open for UiT affiliated researchers to deposit data.

fields.name: UnBraL Fronteiras
fields.description: For researchers working in Brazilian Border Studies.

fields.name: University of Alberta Libraries
fields.description: Open for University of Alberta affiliated researchers to deposit data.

fields.name: ICRISAT
fields.description: International Crops Research Institute for the Semi-Arid Tropics.  Free open data repository of ICRISAT research data including Social science, Phenotypic, Genotypic, Spatial and Soil & Weather data which are linked with open publications.

fields.name: Scholars Portal
fields.description: Open for researchers and organizations associated with Ontario universities to deposit data.
